transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. Haan ji sir. Voice nahi aa rahi aapki, beech mein voice kat rahi hai.
Executive: Haan? Ye review kar lijiye sir baki. Ek baar thoda sa portal pe zyada active rahiye bas. Lead quality aa rahi hai sir, theek hai? To jaise aapne I am interested pe click kiya hoga na udhar se, theek hai? Jitne bhi kiya hoga. To aapka ye category ek baar phir se active ho jayega, theek hai? To ek suggestion phir se jayega, ye leads ki quality aapko dobara se isme aayegi notifications mein. Application download karke rakhiyega sir. Agar aapke paas hai to aap pe aur agar jo aapke staff hain jo handle karti hain madam, theek hai? Unko bhi bol dijiyega apna application IndiaMART ka download karke rakh le.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Uspe notification tez jaata hai ya mail pe aapko turant jaati hai.
Customer: Mail pe nahi aata na IndiaMART.
Executive: Application. Mail pe sir, application pe notification aati hai leads ki.
Customer: Theek hai?
Executive: Hmm. Turant ya phir system pe turant alert aata hai aapko ki haan ek nayi lead aayi hai aapke regarding. To jab tak alert aata hai sir tab tak aap connect karte ho tab tak wo leads sold out ho jati hai kyunki aap kaafi time baad karte ho open.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Baki sir mujhe jaise na Dipanshu ka aapne feedback pe no de diya na mujhe uska reason jaanna tha sir. Matlab unke sath koi problem aa rahi hai.
Customer: Wahi Dipanshu ko main kaam karne ka matlab. Hmm. Hello. Tab se bata raha hu main pehle din se bata raha hu ki yaar ye wo abhi kya hai aapka kaam. Hmm hmm. Usko ki yaar ye nahi ho raha hai usko lead hi nahi generate ho rahi hai. Hmm hmm. Wo bolta hai abhi kya hai har ek aadmi aapka aata hai alag alag bol deta hai. Wo bolta hai aapke idhar lead hi kam hai. Hmm hmm. Alag alag tarike se alag alag sabka ye. Nahi sir lead kam nahi hai. Aap dekhoge agar lead to already aa rahi hai. Maine aapko jo paas lead dikhai hai jo bhi aapko dikhai. Wo main aapko already dikha diya sir. Haan. To wo sir aapko kuch bhi show kar raha hoga leads aa rahi hai aapko. Daily to waise bhi itni badi quantity sir jaise kisi ko 20000 piece chahiye. Ab aap pan India level se baat kar rahe ho sir ya aapke near by location se. To near by mein sir to daily to nahi aayegi main khud bol raha hu sir itni badi quantity. But pan India se to aati hai sir inquiry. 1 lakh ke upar ka aapko main inquiry lagaunga to har do ghante char ghante pe inquiry aati hain. But sir aap portal pe thoda sa aur active rahenge to sir aapko hath mein aapki inquiry samne se milegi. Are do saal se hum active nahi hua hai aisa hai na kaam hi nahi kiya humne kuch aisa hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Abhi sir aap bata rahe ho aapne application aaj kal download kiya isse pehle IndiaMART aapne download kiya.
Customer: Nahi kiya tha application.
Executive: Bola hi nahi online mein kya karta tha.
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Haan?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan bolo. Haan Vikas ji. Application download kar liya sir aur application pe bhi zyada active rahiyega aap, theek hai? Uspe notification aapko pehle aati hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To notification aaye sir usko turant open karke contact kariyega, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Iske pehle matlab aapne abhi tak application nahi download kiya hua tha. Locking tha thoda sa.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Theek hai sir, hai na? Baki waisa koi issue nahi aa raha sir aapka product wagera sara kuch ekdam correct hai. Sab kuch theek thaak se sahi se mapped hai. Aisa issue bilkul nahi hai sir. Thoda sa portal pe aap aur active rahiye. Leads sold out ratio zyada hai sir.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Lead ka sir jo consumption rate hai wo bahut high hai. Thoda sa aapko sir aur active rehna padega. Application aapne download kar liya hai abhi. Hmm. To wo theek hai. Waha pe aapko notification aayegi waha pe aap notification pe click karke on kariyega, theek hai sir? Hmm. Baki Dipanshu ke sath apne team jo hai aapke account manager unke sath connected rakhiye sir. Aisa nahi hai jab wo phone kar rahe hain tabhi aap phone utha rahe hain. Theek hai?
Executive: Right?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Theek hai. Hmm.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To main ye sir aapka ye bhi band kar de raha hu concern yaha se, theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complained about not generating leads.

- Customer mentioned issues with Dipanshu's work.

- Customer stated they haven't been active for two years.



Resolution:

- Executive advised to be more active on portal.

- Executive suggested downloading the IndiaMART application.

- Executive recommended staying connected with account managers.

- Executive confirmed product and mapping are correct.



Next Steps: 

- Executive closed the concern.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, application, portal, account manager, active
